meta.job_title: Senior RGM (Revenue Growth Management) Category Analyst

duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver actionable insights across the firm KPI’s on price, distribution and promotion.
Develop competitive landscaping models to track product launches, price changes, and pricing ladders.
Prepares and delivers profit, promotional, price, and brand scorecards to internal and external stakeholders.
Manage national price list and price promoted groups.
Key point of contact on price and promotional analysis for RGM team.
Provide market and sales fundamental analysis to assist leadership assessment to drive decisions regarding risks & opportunities.
Drive SKU productivity and profitability analysis.
Use technical skills with appropriate analysis applications to provide optimum level of support to the local RGM category team (Excel, PowerPoint, Word).

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Analytic, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
